Text.Page:
Things are grim in Darkquaver Woods. Seems like everything's turned against us.

I need you to kill {@LinkCreature:56#16#Darkquaver hyenas}, {@LinkCreature:56#17#razortusk warthogs}, {@LinkCreature:55#1#mad sporewalkers}, and {@LinkCreature:55#11#silvermane unicorns}.

Report to Belva at Darkquaver Garrison when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
